snippet: Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal can take a step closer to a 50th career showdown when they play their fourth-round matches at the U.S. Open on Sunday....
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal can take a step closer to a 50th career showdown when they play their fourth-round matches at the U.S. Open on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic and Nadal Closing In on Semi-Final Showdown
headline.main: Djokovic and Nadal Closing In on Semi-Final Showdown
